tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE spare_parts_inventory (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name TEXT,
    part_type TEXT,
    quantity INT,
    cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE spare_parts (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    part_category VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE robot_components (
    component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    component_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES supplier(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE spare_parts (
	spare_part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	quantity INT NOT NULL,
	price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE components (
	component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	available BOOLEAN NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE robots (
	robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	component_id INT REFERENCES components(component_id)
)

CREATE TABLE SpareParts (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    supplier_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Components (
    component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    unit_weight DECIMAL(6,2),
    unit_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    in_stock BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Robots (
    robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_name VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturing_date DATE,
    warranty_expiry_date DATE,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE RobotInventory (
    robot_id INT,
    part_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (robot_id, part_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robots(robot_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES SpareParts(part_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SpareParts (
 part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 part_name VARCHAR(255),
 part_description TEXT,
 quantity INT,
 price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Components (
 component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 component_name VARCHAR(255),
 component_type VARCHAR(50),
 part_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES SpareParts(part_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Robots (
 robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 robot_name VARCHAR(255),
 manufacturing_date DATE,
 component_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (component_id) REFERENCES Components(component_id)
)

CREATE TABLE RobotInventory (
 inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 robot_id INT,
 quantity INT,
 location VARCHAR(100),
 FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robots(robot_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
 log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 robot_id INT,
 maintenance_date DATE,
 maintenance_description TEXT,
 FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robots(robot_id)
)
